ali siruruwalin rura, jalathalaya wetha watena diya binduwala rawaya pamani ee.mama yalith siti sthanayen piyawara deka thunak pasu basa nathara wannahama, owun da eka wanwa pawurak ha samawa mata lan wu athara piyawara deka thunak thaba nawathunaha.oya aakarayata ma owun gen pa්ramanawath durak aath wu bawatath, thama ranchuwa aarakshitha bawatath pa්ramukhathwaya gena ki්raya kala athinna hata eeththu giyen, yalith swakiya piriwara ha samanga wawa kara with supurudu jala ki්radawe yeduna ha.thawada pera sandahan charyawa hudek ma biya ganwanu was kala rangapamak wuwada, kadima aarakshitha upaka්ramayak bawa da mehila sandahan kala yuthuma ya.supurudu hudakalawenma wawa kara pamini thaniya anek kawaradakatawath wada wenas ki්rayawaliyaka niratha wiya.

warthamanaya wana wita lankawa thula piramidakara mudal jawaram nathara kirima sandaha nithimaya prathipadana sakas kara atha. 1988 anka 30 darana banku panatha thula me sandaha widhiwidhana athath, maha bankuwa wisin piramidakara jawaramwalata sambandha nowana lesa janathawagen illim karamin, danwim pala kirimen obbata pramanawath madihath wimak sidu karanu me wana thek daknata nolabe.

sarath fonsekawa athadanguwata ganima sambandha thrasajanaka puwath gananawak aanduwa parshawayen nikuth wuna apata mathakayi.janadhipathiwaranaya data pasu ohu lagum gath hotalaya siya ganan hamuda khanda yawa watalu aanduwa chodana kale fonseka hamuda kumanthranayak sadaha laka lasthi wu bawayi.hamuda kumanthranaya kriyathmaka wennata giya aakaraya gana mawil kelin karawana katha gananak rajaye madhya haraha eliyata enna patan gaththa.janadhipathiwa galu parata genawith mara damimata fonseka wipaksha deshapalakayan samaga kumanthranaya kala bawa kiyawuna.hamudawen pana giya aya yayi kiyamin fonsekage aarakshakayan gananawak ath adanguwata ganuna.hamuda kumanthranayakata hawul wu bawa kiyamin me siyallanwama hamudawa wisin kudalagena yanu labuwa.

api inne rotiyak una....ow thatiyak wage rotiyak uda...
munta 40 wenakota apita 80 wa wath wela thiyeyine.
eeth gamen bhagayayi thawama nidahas karala thiyenne.
films balanna kamathiyi.
puja wattiyak ho malpahan pudakala pasu ho adahili wishwasa thamata balapanne keseda?
owunwa parlimenthuwata pathkala yatharthaya abhawayata gos dan boho kalak gathawa atha.
ithin mahajana sewa sapayanne kohomada?
un wapuranne wath,
enamuth me dinawala ek pudgalayek rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamayata happemin siti.
me andamata aananda theranuwo puja bhanada washayen boho awasthawaladi salupili laba atha.
rawayata wada karannata siduwu janamadhyawedin athara garu katayuthu aya sitiya se ma adhama ganaye la salakiya haki ayada sitiyeya.

adin thawath wasarak uda we.
wenasma athdakimak ne ithin.
eeka mage athatama ahuwuna.
mata dan ambaneta bayath ekka.
mama kiwwe ahaka balan..mekita meka kiwwoth heta panthiyama danagani...anna aru sayans de suwaniyar eka bade hangagaththa kiyala..
lokaya wenas karanne wenas widihata hithana minissu.
eka lesakin kiwoth jith ha mama wenama wishayan walata athagasa bhayanaka paryeshanayak aarambha kala se ma wishala abhiyogayak da bhara gaththemu.
“wahallu” awasan unayin passe tika kalekata mage athin kathawak liya nowewi..

sancharaka shri lanka krikat kandayama saha batahira indiya kodew kandayama athara pawathwena thewana ekdina tharangaye palamuwa panduwata pahara dun shri lanka kandayamata niyamitha panduwara 50 thuladi kadulu 06 dawi lakunu 274k raskala.ee anuwa kodew kandayamata jayagrahanaya sandaha lakunu 275ka ilakkayak himiwa thibenawa.ehidi shri lanka pila wenuwen wanidu hasaranga pandu 60thula lakunu 80 ras kala athara ashen bandara pandu 74k thula lakunu 55 ras kala.
ee kawyaya ahagena indala rajjuruwantath harima kanagatuyi..

antharaya aushadha palaka mandalaya magin karana lada parikshanayakata anuwa shri lankawe heroyinwalata abbahi wuwan warshayakata heroyin kilo 763 k pamana bhawithayata ganna bawa heliwi thibe.adhikariya magin karana lada mema parikshanayedi lankawe dinakadi pawichchiyata ganna heroyin pramanaya kilo 2 kata wadi bawath widi aashrithawa heroyin bhawitha karannan hathalis pandahak pamana sitina bawath adhikariya wadiduratath prakasha karayi..
me rahas kawuluwen kruthiye anthargathaya saha aakruthiya sahithyaya patakayata nawum athdakimak genadunna.
samahara thanwala wahane janele paththakin balannath bayayi.

dan ithin uuta kama denawa, kawanawa eka wikarayayi.
